name: RoguePets
description:
This is our Ludum Dare 41 Game! A Virtual Pet Roguelike by Jaden Giordano, Lodugh, Daniel McCulloch, and Pedro Gabriel (Pidroh).

You've been trapped! You and your most beloved pet have been locked away in the deep dark depths of a dungeon and must break free. You must venture a realm where many before have perished and break the wretched curse set on the undead.

Credits:
Lodugh - Design/Programming
Daniel McCulloch - Music/SFX
Jaden Giordano - Programming
Pedro Gabriel (Pidroh) - Art
